SELECT th.account_id, a.account_number, th.amount, th.transfer_type, th.transfer_with, th.transfer_time FROM transfer_history th INNER JOIN accounts a ON th.account_id = a.account_id WHERE th.account_id = #{account_id} ORDER BY th.transfer_time DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{start_idx}
